passive.name: Crystallize
passive.description: Increases the wearer's Effect Hit Rate by <orangeStrong>{{1, percent}}%</orangeStrong>. When the wearer deals DMG to an enemy inflicted with Wind Shear, Burn, Shock, or Bleed, each respectively grants 1 stack of Prophet, stacking up to {{4}} time(s). In a single battle, only 1 stack of Prophet can be granted for each type of DoT. Every stack of Prophet increases wearer's ATK by <orangeStrong>{{2, percent}}%</orangeStrong> and enables the DoT dealt to ignore <orangeStrong>{{3, percent(fixed: 1)}}%</orangeStrong> of the target's DEF.
